title: Space for Life
description:
Wander through lush gardens, meet exotic species, and journey through
                                space in this science-filled adventure.

title: La Ronde Amusement Park
description:
Enjoy thrilling rides, family attractions, and scenic views at
                                Montreal’s largest amusement park—fun for all ages!

title: Underground City (RESO)
description:
Discover Montreal’s vast network of underground shops, restaurants, and
                                walkways—perfect for exploring rain or shine.

title: Montreal Museum of Fine Arts (MMFA)
description:
View renowned artworks, tour elegant galleries, and enjoy cultural
                                experiences at this world-class museum.

title: Old Port Montreal
description:
Stroll along the historic waterfront, enjoy outdoor events, and take in
                                stunning views of the city and river.

title: Lachine Canal
description:
Take in scenic waterside views, bike along peaceful paths, or kayak
                                through Montreal’s historic canal route.

title: Atwater Market
description:
Browse fresh produce, gourmet treats, and artisan goods at one of
                                Montreal’s most beloved public markets.

title: Mont Royal
description:
Soak in breathtaking city views, wander peaceful trails, or picnic by
                                Beaver Lake in this serene escape.

title: Jean-Drapeau Park
description:
Admire sweeping views of Montreal, follow scenic walking paths, or rest
                                by tranquil Beaver Lake.

title: Street Art in Plateau
description:
Discover vibrant murals, hidden gems, and bold graffiti that bring
                                Montreal’s streets to life with color and culture.

title: Saint Joseph's Oratory
description:
Visit this stunning basilica, admire sweeping city views, and enjoy
                                peaceful walks through its serene gardens.

title: Montreal's Food Sense
description:
Savor iconic bagels, cheesy poutine, and diverse flavors across
                                Montreal’s lively food scene.

title: Osheaga
description:
Dance to top artists, discover new music, and soak up summer vibes at
                                Montreal’s biggest outdoor festival.

title: Terrace Dining
description:
Dine under the open sky, sip drinks with a view, and enjoy Montreal’s
                                lively patio culture.

title: Quebec City
description:
Wander cobblestone streets, visit historic landmarks, and soak in the
                                charm of this timeless city.

title: Laurentian Mountains
description:
Escape to scenic peaks, hike forested trails, or unwind at cozy
                                lakeside spots in the Laurentians.
